author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Inflation ebbs, as centric banks cast spell,
Like rabbits in burrows, desiring not fell.
Healing supply in hopeful gears,
A snail's pace, yet with lesser fears.

Rivals in clover, on far distant shores,
As goats keen to spar, their battle roars.
Shein and Temu, in courts they scheme,
In the land of dragons, a contentious theme.

Pass on thy wealth, free of tension and strife,
A noble dog's loyalty, through the wheel of life.
Plan thy estate, with wisdom and love,
As gentle as the cooing of the dove.

feedItems.title: Why the Drivers of Lower Inflation Matter
feedItems.description: Competing effects of central banks, healing supply chains affect recession odds.

feedItems.title: China-Founded Rivals Ramp Up War for American Shoppers
feedItems.description: Online sellers Shein and Temu are fighting in U.S. courts, alleging dirty tricks as they duel for workers and suppliers back in China.

feedItems.title: Pass On Your Heirlooms, Not Family Drama
feedItems.description: How to creatively approach estate planning and divvying up inherited items.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Upon Twitter's sphere, now known as X, Kanye West endears,
Ban lifted, he returns, his voice in many ears.
No coin shall he make, nor ads shall you spy,
Ale not gold, his words will ply. 

A tale of fiction wrought by man of law,
Stirs real-life drama, causeth gnashing jaw.
Crooked financier, by plot engrossed,
Seeketh to have the honest judge deposed.

Thy clone-stamped cards, seventy three in count,
A feat deceptively profound.
To steal a fortune, on bull's eye and monster sipped,
Yet, like sour ale, her freedom slipped.

feedItems.title: X, Formerly Known as Twitter, Reinstates Kanye West's Account
feedItems.description: West won’t be eligible to monetize his account, and ads won’t appear next to his posts.

feedItems.title: Judge's Fictional Thriller Sparks Real-Life Courtroom Drama
feedItems.description: Plot featuring crooked hedge-funder inspires actual financier to try to get jurist booted off case

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: She used 73 cloned food-stamp cards to steal $158,000—and spent it all on Red Bull and Monster Energy drinks

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
When thou halt thy mead-horn at just a dram,
Slight does the wight 'neath Odin's piercing gaze.
The fruitful vine's kiss in goblet's palm,
A test of temperance in the twilight's haze.

In Valhalla, a warrior emerges from strife,
Each stumble a tale, inscribed in rune.
From travail and toil, we carve our life,
To falter, to rise, to the stars we attune.

In the realm of giants, a mighty steed falters,
Yellow by name, by fate undone.
In the clash of clans and creed it wavers,
A titan of wheels 'gainst the dawning sun.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: What happens when you really do stop at one glass of wine a day

feedItems.title: Your Biggest Career Mistakes---and What You Learned From Them
feedItems.description: Everybody stumbles at some point. The question is: What do you do next?

feedItems.title: Why Trucking Company Yellow Verges on Collapse
feedItems.description: One of the oldest and biggest U.S. trucking businesses has been wrecked by a string of mergers that left it saddled with debt and has been stalled by a standoff with the Teamsters union.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Beside the dunes of Saudi's gold,
A meeting place for stories told,
To broker peace 'midst steel and stone,
In Ukraine's name stands not alone.

For son of Columbia's presidential might,
Arrested under cover of night.
In charges of tainted gold's disease,
From a serpent's kiss and lucrative ease.

The apple once pure and robust,
Now confess to a fault, as all things must,
A bug within the parent's keep,
Promises to mend as children weep.

feedItems.title: Saudi Arabia to Host Ukraine Peace Talks as Part of Western Effort to Woo Global South
feedItems.description: Washington and Europe are hoping the talks, which exclude Russia, can lead to international backing for peace terms favoring Ukraine.

feedItems.title: Son of Colombian President Arrested on Money Laundering Charges
feedItems.description: The Attorney General’s office says it is investigating allegations that Nicolás Petro took money from drug traffickers during his father’s presidential campaign.

feedItems.title: Apple Admits to Bug in Screen Time Parental Controls
feedItems.description: Settings aren’t sticking; the company says it’s working “to improve the situation.”
